subject: Become a CPAN Author
header: It wasn't a good week. John Anderson (genehack) is rather ill, and the passing of Brian McCauley. Unfortunately this is part of life. Make the best of it!
Please forgive me the cheesy turn: Who knows what happens to you tomorrow? Become a CPAN Author now!
